evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Discussed presentation anxiety and social avoidance at language club. Solutions: recording practice videos starting with 30-second segments, emailing club organizers, and using cookie-baking for social initiation. Sarah responded positively: recorded presentation introduction at scheduled time, baked cookies, shared photo evidence, and planned cookie-sharing with peer. Progress shown through executed recording, initiated social baking, and time-management strategies.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Sarah discussed presentation anxiety and avoidance of language club. Solutions offered included recording short presentation segments and emailing club organizers first. Sarah accepted recording 30 seconds at 8pm and baking cookies to initiate social connections. She demonstrated progress by scheduling the recording, texting a classmate to arrange cookie delivery, and considering keeping her recording. Evidence includes her completed cookie photo text and specific plan to meet after class.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Sarah discussed presentation anxiety and avoidance of language club due to social fears. Solutions offered: recording short presentation clips and emailing club organizers. She accepted both, scheduling recording practice at 8pm and considering keeping one weekly clip as progress journal. Later, she initiated cookie-baking for study group, sending photo evidence of follow-through. Progress shown through completed recording task, social initiative, and reframing nervousness as readiness.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Problems discussed: 1) Anxiety about class presentation delivery 2) Avoidance of language exchange club 3) Difficulty initiating social connections. Solutions offered/accepted: 1) Recording short presentation segments 2) Emailing club organizers 3) Using baking/shared food for social connection. Student's response: Initially hesitant but scheduled recording practice, baked cookies independently, and arranged cookie-sharing meetup. Evidence of progress: Set specific practice time, reframed nervousness as normal, initiated social contact via text, and demonstrated self-awareness by requesting support.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Problems discussed: 1) Anxiety about class presentations and joining language club, 2) Difficulty initiating social connections. Solutions offered/accepted: 1) Recording 30-second presentation segments at scheduled times, 2) Emailing club organizers instead of in-person approach, 3) Baking cookies for study groups to facilitate interactions. Student's response: Initially hesitant but scheduled recording, baked cookies, and arranged follow-up meeting. Evidence of progress: 1) Completed cookie baking and shared photo evidence, 2) Scheduled specific practice time with reminder, 3) Practiced opening line for study group, 4) Initiated recipe check request and taste-test meeting.
